title: For P2P platforms
description: Arboreum AI improves risk management of lender portfolios, allowing inclusion of riskier borrowers

title: For Employers
description: Arboreum builds and manages company-only credit unions, creating an additional benefit for colleagues

title: For Pro-Social Investors
description: Arboreum invests your funds in financially underserved communities; e.g. farmers, cleaners, etc
